title: South Africa : digital population as of January 2020
summary: This statistic gives information on the Number of Africa digital South Africa users as of 2020 .
As of that Digital , the mainly mobile photo sharing network had reached 36.54 millions Africa digital users , up from 22.0 millions in 2020 .
The app is one of the most popular social networks worldwide .
gold: This statistic presents the digital population in South Africa as of January 2020 . During this period of time , it was found that South Africa had 36.54 million internet users , of which 34.93 million were mobile internet users .
